articles.title: 'Sick to my stomach': Top model Bella Hadid on OGHS attack - Otago Daily Times

articles.content: A petition calling for action after the an alleged racist attack at Otago Girls High School has seen international recognition.Allegations have been made that an attack made on Muslim pupils of the s… [+1373 chars]
